long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FocusFlow: Pomodoro Timer

Boost your productivity with FocusFlow, a simple yet powerful Pomodoro Timer for Chrome.

FocusFlow helps you stay focused and manage your time efficiently using the Pomodoro Technique. Break your work into intervals, take regular breaks, and significantly improve your productivity.

Key Features:

* Customizable timer with preset and custom durations
* Clean, distraction-free interface
* Visual and desktop notifications when time's up
* Easy one-click reset for new sessions
* Browser badge showing remaining time

Perfect for students, professionals, writers, and anyone looking to enhance their focus and time management skills.

FocusFlow respects your privacy and doesn't collect any personal data.

Install FocusFlow now and transform the way you work!
